short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tools that make life as a Slack emoji addict a little easier.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will not be receiving updates due to the Manifest V3 updated forced upon extension developers. For more information on why Manifest V3 is a bad thing for extensions developers and users: https://www.eff.org/deeplinks/2021/12/chrome-users-beware-manifest-v3-deceitful-and-threatening

-----

Ever wanted to upload 100 emoji to slack in one fell swoop? Now you can.

1. Install this extension
2. Go to your Slack's /customize/emoji page
3. Drag and drop your emoji image files into the new "Bulk Emoji Uploader". Make sure that the image files are named what you want the emoji name to be ("ditto.gif" will become ":ditto:").
4. You've now got a whole lotta emoji!
